abstract: JPMorgan Chase’s chief, Jamie Dimon, took a moment to send the firm’s 222,000 employees some warm thoughts for the new year.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase’s chief, Jamie Dimon, took a moment to send the firm’s 222,000 employees some warm thoughts for the new year.
lead_paragraph: As the clock to 2011 winds down, JPMorgan Chase’s chief, Jamie Dimon, took a moment to send the firm’s 222,000 employees some warm thoughts for the new year.
